content: size newborn 3-6mos 6-12mos 1-2yrs 3-4yrs materials 1 1 1 2 2 balls of debbie bliss eco baby print 16 circular needle in size 5 use size 4 if you re a loose knitter and two double-pointed needles to make i-cords gauge 25 stitches=4 in stockinette stitch cast on 72 88 94 104 112 stitches join being careful not to twist and work in garter stitch knit one row purl one row for 1 begin stockinette stitch knit every row and continue until piece measures 5 ½ 6 ½ 7 7 ¾ 8 ½ from edge next row knit 2 and place these 2 stitches on a little holder bind off next 33 41 44 49 53 stitches one stitch remains on right hand needle knit 2 more stitches and put those 3 stitches on another little holder bind off remaining stitches keeping last stitch on needle and slip the two stitches from the first holder onto the needle along with that last stitch using your double-pointed needles just because it s a little easier knit an i-cord* on these 3 stitches for 8-8 ½ cut yarn and pull thru the 3 stitches so that it won t unravel we ll finish off later slip the 3 stitches from the other holder onto one of your dpn s and with a new piece of yarn knit another i-cord on these stitches for 8-8 ½ cut yarn and pull through the 3 stitches now make a neat overhand knot near the end of each i-cord trying to make them both about the same length pull knot nice and tight cut off end of i-cord approximately ¼- ½ below knot sew a neat seam along the top of hat start at the base of one of the i-cords and seam together top edges to the other i-cord tie or knot i-cords together done *i-cord knit across the 3 stitches slide your knitting to the other end of your needle and bring your yarn around and knit again continue in this manner until your i-cord is the desired length
